column1:
"
List of events

date = the date of the event
event = short description of the event (in french)
fictional = True if the event is fictional, False if not
name_presented = name as it appears on the screen during the experiment (in french)

Note that the time of the experiment (present) is set in 2019.
Therefore, there are two events in 2019, one past and one future.

"
